name: Xenophobia
description:
They want to destroy Earth

In year 20XX, an alien from a planet at the edge of our galaxy destroyed our moon. Years later, more of these aliens are on their way to Earth and it's up to you to stop them.

The Pentagon has equipped you with an experimental new combat shuttle. Go, hero - stop them by any means necessary. Show our strength.

Controls

Move with 'WASD' or Arrow Keys

Fire a single missle with 'F' or 'Space' or Left Click

Fire a barrage with 'R' or Right Click

Features

  • Side-scrolling space shooter for PC and Mac
  • Something that almost resembles a consistant art style!
  • 2 levels
  • Adaptive story that's different every time you play!
  • (Not really, the story is the same every time - ain't nobody got time for that)
  • Open-source music by Komiku

This is a student project for INFSCI1061 at the University of Pittsburgh
